name: NL Industries, Inc.
description: NL Industries, Inc. is a diversified holding company based in the United States, primarily engaged in the manufacturing and marketing of a variety of industrial products. Founded in 1891, NL Industries has evolved significantly over the years, establishing a strong presence in various sectors, including chemicals, industrial coatings, and specialty products. The company operates through its subsidiaries, which focus on producing high-quality products for multiple industries such as construction, electronics, and automotive. NL Industries is well-known for its commitment to sustainability and innovation, actively pursuing initiatives to reduce environmental impact while enhancing product performance. The company's dedication to developing advanced materials and solutions positions it as a leader in the industrial sector. Through strategic acquisitions and investments, NL Industries continues to expand its market reach and product offerings, ensuring it meets the evolving needs of its customers. The company's core values emphasize integrity, quality, and customer satisfaction, driving its mission to deliver exceptional products and services. NL Industries aims to leverage its extensive industry experience and technical expertise to create value for shareholders and contribute positively to the communities it serves.
